Easy Protein Tree Annotating¶

Easy Protein Tree Annotating (EPTA) will solve your problem of how to build an informative protein phylogenetic tree easil to help you to build a protein tree from FASTA files.

    • Features
    • Github
    • Support
    • License

  • Download
    • Install EPTA from command line
    • Download EPTA manually:

Learn how to use EPTA:

      • Output path
      • Check point

    • Multiple sequence alignment
      • MAFFT
      • MUSCLE
      • trimAl
    • Make a tree from alignment file
    • Annotate a tree file
  • Commands
    • General
      • -i [file or path]
      • -o [file or path]
      • -em [email address]
    • Parse FASTA
      • -dh
      • -tax
      • -name
      • -dom
      • -pfam
      • -pev [E-value]
      • -pas
    • Make alignment
    • Make phylogenetic tree
    • Tree Annotating
